synopsis.text: Goemon, Jazz, and their fellow first-year students of the Misfit Class at Babyls Demon School return as heroes after defeating a magical beast at Walter Park. However, their victory is short-lived as they are faced with a new challenge: to reach the Dalet rank by the end of the school year or face expulsion from the Royal One classroom. To help them achieve this task, the school assigns special tutors to hone their talents and innate abilities. Meanwhile, the annual harvest season brings forth a new challenge as students compete in a dangerous jungle battle for food. Will Iruma Suzuki and his classmates be able to rise to the occasion and achieve their goal? Join them as they embark on a new adventure filled with trials, tribulations, and exciting new opportunities.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
